alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND... NORTHWESTERN MONTOUR...SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING AND NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm east of Muncy, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hughesville, Jerseytown, Iola, Eyers Grove, Exchange, Biggertown, Lairdsville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
